Articles.Content:
I admit, this wasn't the first time I've landed on the moon, but this was the first time I've done it manually with no cheats. A wonderful feeling. 

When I separated from the second stage, the trunk bent (I probably put the falcon control core back on after doing things in the trunk). 

Used a a slightly modified dragon v2. Slid down a giant Cliff, then fell over, breaking the solar panel. Made It back to kerbin sucessfully though. 

Imgur Album: 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/h5JAe)
Congrats. I always found Duna easier than the Mun...
